file_content.text: It is a mistake to risk chaos for the sake of exposing these Jawa curiosities.
The Empire must not learn of these so-called "shamans."
Ah, of course. Hello.
Are you the group I was told to expect? I'm surprised you would lend your names to a job like this.
You must be the bright young Sith I was told to expect. Frankly, I'm surprised you would lend your approval to this sort of mission.
You must be the bounty hunter sent by Commander Vilos. I'm surprised someone of your reputation would even take this job.
Commander Vilos told me to expect you. I'm surprised someone of your background would agree to a mission like this.
The idea that a Jawa, the lowest sort of alien scum, has the discipline it takes to use the Force is nothing short of insulting.
These Jawa "shamans" are simply charlatans putting on a show for the gullible. However, if it were true...
The only way to know is to go after them.
Then they're a threat.
No!
Sounds like your faith isn't as unshakable as you'd like.
Not sure after all?
Is there a point to this?
Watch your tone!
This has the potential to sow chaos throughout the Empire.
Imagine if no one respected the power of the Sith; if they believed the lowest slave could master the same powers.
For the sake of the Empire, it is crucial that the Force remain mysterious, the province of the elite. Not... Jawas.
You think we should ignore any threat they pose?
What would you do, then?
Hear hear!
Is this a bad time to ask for your advice on restraining Force users?
I guess you're not on board.
On the contrary, I will aid you in Commander Vilos's quest, but only because I expect you to redirect your goals.
Find this Jawa training ground, hunt down this shaman, but kill her and any Force users you see.
Bring Commander Vilos a regular Jawa warrior and tell him it's the shaman. Any studies will "prove" conclusively that Jawas have no connection to the Force.
I will help you preserve the power of the Sith.
Yes, my lord.
Your loyalty is appreciated.
I forged these shackles myself to hold Jedi and cut off their connection to the Force. Using them will suggest the danger this "shaman" poses.
Just take care which Jawa you use them on.
I'm not going to lie just to serve your political goals.
I will do no such thing.
My goals are the goals of the Empire. Commander Vilos is a fool!
However, he has alerted our superiors to this issue, and they expect results. I suggest you reconsider, but I will not interfere with your mission.
These shackles have held Jedi before; they should restrain your "shaman" easily. If she exists.
This planet is no home for those strong in the Force.
